meanings.definition: In a pitiful or hopeless manner
meanings.sent1: She looked forlornly at the broken toy.
meanings.sent2: He sighed forlornly as he realized he missed the bus.
meanings.sent3: The puppy howled forlornly when left alone in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The old man sat forlornly on the park bench, lost in memories.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled forlornly through the empty streets.
